page.shortlink: ux spin list properties definition method
page.description: Specifies the data source for the Spin List control options.

discussion.p: A Spin List control can be populated with static data or data that is dynamically calculated via a [Data Series].

description.p: The *[ui:Method for defining list]* can be one of the following options:

item.name: Static
item.description: Data is defined at design-time as a static list.

item.name: DataSeries
item.description: Data is defined using a Data Series.
